reviewtext: Lot of good reviews, but not a reliable piece of h/w. I bought it because of 5* review, but i dont trust all those reviews, as i am completely dissatisfied with this product. On/Off switch came off after just 10 months of use. Not too much time in surge protector life span.Thank God, i did not really faced any power surge, i cant imagine such low quality product saving any of my electronic device.And if you have already don't similar mistake of buying this product, then don't touch on/off switch, and pray that it performs when time comes.
